name: Yet Another Case Opener
description:
Try and get rare skins in this case opener!

Low on money? Sell some skins or open a free case.

Download and play for free and jump start your case opening adventure today!

★ 6 Cases!
★ Inspect Items!
★ Inventory!
★ Sell Skins!

* Warning

Saving does not work on the web version, any progress you make will not be saved.
